mapper.sql: OrderNumber, OrderID, OrderMoney, OrderState, ChannelID, InterfacePercentage, InterfaceName, ChannelPercentage, ChannelName, PayItem, EmployeeID, EmployeePercentage, OtherMoney, CreateTime, UserID, CheckTime, CheckID, CheckOrderID, Remark, ReturnTime, ReturnInterfaceOrderNumber, ReturnBankOrderNumber, ReturnMessage, platID, LiftCycle, LiftTime
mapper.select: SELECT a.orderMoney, INSERT (b.UserName, 4, 4, '****') userName FROM deal_order a LEFT JOIN accounts_users b ON a.userid = b.userid WHERE a.OrderState = 2 AND b.trueName IS NOT NULL AND a.orderMoney <= 10000 ORDER BY a.createTime DESC LIMIT 20;
mapper.insert: insert into deal_order (OrderNumber, OrderID, OrderMoney, OrderState, ChannelID, InterfacePercentage, InterfaceName, ChannelPercentage, ChannelName, PayItem, EmployeeID, EmployeePercentage, OtherMoney, CreateTime, UserID, CheckTime, CheckID, CheckOrderID, Remark, ReturnTime, ReturnInterfaceOrderNumber, ReturnBankOrderNumber, ReturnMessage, platID, LiftCycle, LiftTime) values (#{ordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ordermoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channelid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{interfacepercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{interfacename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelpercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{channelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payitem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{employeepercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{othermoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checkid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{checkorderid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{returninterfaceordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnbankordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnmessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{liftcycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lifttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update deal_order
OrderID = #{orderid,jdbcType=CHAR},
OrderMoney = #{ordermoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OrderState = #{orderstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ChannelID = #{channelid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
InterfacePercentage = #{interfacepercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
InterfaceName = #{interfacename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ChannelPercentage = #{channelpercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ChannelName = #{channelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PayItem = #{payitem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EmployeeID = #{employeeid,jdbcType=CHAR},
EmployeePercentage = #{employeepercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OtherMoney = #{othermoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UserID = #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR},
CheckTime = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CheckID = #{checkid,jdbcType=CHAR},
CheckOrderID = #{checkorderid,jdbcType=CHAR},
Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ReturnTime = #{returntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ReturnInterfaceOrderNumber = #{returninterfaceordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ReturnBankOrderNumber = #{returnbankordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ReturnMessage = #{returnmessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
platID = #{platid,jdbcType=CHAR},
LiftCycle = #{liftcycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LiftTime = #{lifttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where OrderNumber = #{ordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
